function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Anonymous self-completed online questionnaire may lead to inaccurate data due to lack of verification of participant identity.","Impact":"Inaccurate data could lead to flawed conclusions and ineffective strategies for mitigating contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement verification measures such as email confirmation or CAPTCHA to ensure participant identity.","Technologies":"Email confirmation, CAPTCHA","People":"Participants, researchers, public health organizations","Owner":"Researchers, platform administrators"},{"Description":"Use of SurveyMonkey platform may pose a security risk for participant data.","Impact":"Potential exposure of sensitive participant information leading to privacy breaches and data misuse.","Mitigation":"Use secure and encrypted platforms for data collection and storage, and regularly update security measures.","Technologies":"Secure and encrypted data storage, regular security updates","People":"Participants, researchers, platform administrators","Owner":"Researchers, platform administrators"},{"Description":"Photovoice technique could lead to privacy concerns for participants if the photographs reveal identifiable information about their homes.","Impact":"Potential invasion of participant privacy and confidentiality.","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines for photograph content to avoid revealing identifiable details, and obtain informed consent for the use of photographs.","Technologies":"Clear guidelines for photograph content, informed consent procedures","People":"Participants, researchers","Owner":"Researchers"}]}
